text:
Currently, you can only set ProxyPreserveHost at the Global or Vhost level.

You should be able to set it inside a <Proxy> Section, to make it apply to a
specific backend.
creator: chip@force-elite.com
sf@sfritsch.de
text:
Created attachment 16351
patch to allow setting the Host: header with an env variable

It would be even more flexible to allow setting the Host: header to any value
by setting an environment variable.
